column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you are big on art
column2: this is the place to go to in Chitown. Not my thing so I give it only 4 stars. Way too many people as well. Not a place for children
column3: they won't enjoy it and they might get bored real quick. The line to get in can be insane
column4: but we had the hop on hop off passes
column5: which got us in threw will call.
